frameDefinitions: The words in this frame refer to facial Expressions and the Possessors of those Expressions.
A Phenomenon, which may be an activity, state or object, is purposefully hidden from the awareness of a potential Cognizer.
The Focal_feature is defined in relation to a Landmark_feature, either as a particular part, or as an immediately bordering entity.
This frame involves words that provide a measure for some undelimited (mass) Entity by referring to an Event that a prototypical quantity (or duration) of the Entity stereotypically participates in.
An Entity (generally food) is exposed to a Heat_source whose Temperature may also be specified.
This frame is  concerned with the percepts that vibrations which travel through the air or another medium produce in hearing organs.
frameExamples: Few people would use ATMs if the content of their transaction was <t>secret</t> from their bank and there was no paper trail verifying the transaction. .
I'm on the <t>summit</t> of Mt. Shasta.
He put two <t>splashes</t> of cologne on his face.
Bacon was <t>frying</t> in the pan, and a great heap of eggs already lay steaming on a plate.
I awoke to the <t>clash</t> of a jackhammer on concrete.
listRoleDefinitions: This is the person who exhibitis the <fen>Expression</fen>.
The emotion that is conveyed by a particular <fen>Expression</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the activity, state or object that is purposefully hidden from the awareness of a potential cognizer.
A period of <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is hidden from the awareness of potential cognizers.
A stable bounded area defined by its relation to another landform. This role is incorporated in each LU in this frame.
The landform with respect to which the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is defined.
An abstract or concrete undelimited entity that is measured by the <fen>Event</fen>.
The event that a delimitable quantity or duration of an <fen>Entity</fen> participates in.
The <fen>Entity</fen> (often a food item)  that absorbs heat.
The <fen>Container</fen> that holds the <fen>Entity</fen> that absorbs the heat.
This role identifies the object that directly supplies heat to the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the heat absorption takes place.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the heat application occurs.
An entity that is construed as a single point source emitting sound.

The location at which sound is produced. This role differs from Location_of_sound_source in that it does not highlight the sound's spreading from its source to the perceiver's location, which is usually indicated by the preposition 'from'.
listRoleExamples: There was stuff in there that was 'secret' <fex>in the 1980s</fex>, but has since become pretty common knowledge.
<fex>Bacon</fex> frying in the pan and scenting the air
Five fat sausages were frying <fex>in the pan</fex>
Food was placed to sizzle <fex>on the barbecue </fex>.
<fex>Five minutes ago</fex>the eggs weren't boiling yet.
<fex>In the kitchen</fex> the meat sizzled in the oven and a big pan of potatoes stood on the hob
He woke up because of the blare <fex>of a car horn</fex>.
There was a clatter of running feet <fex>in the street outside</fex>.
